problem_names: lemma sinvar_correct: "wf_list_graph G \<Longrightarrow> SINVAR_Dependability_norefl.sinvar (list_graph_to_graph G) nP = sinvar G nP"
translations:
proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Dependability.node_props P = NetModel_node_props P

definition "Dependability_norefl_eval G P = (wf_list_graph G \<and>
  sinvar G (SecurityInvariant.node_props SINVAR_Dependability_norefl.default_node_properties P))"
lemma sinvar_correct: "wf_list_graph G \<Longrightarrow> SINVAR_Dependability_norefl.sinvar (list_graph_to_graph G) nP = sinvar G nP"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. wf_list_graph G \<Longrightarrow>
    SINVAR_Dependability_norefl.sinvar (list_graph_to_graph G) nP =
    sinvar G nP

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. wf_list_graph G \<Longrightarrow>
    (\<forall>x\<in>edges (list_graph_to_graph G).
        case x of
        (e1, e2) \<Rightarrow>
          FiniteGraph.num_reachable_norefl (list_graph_to_graph G) e1
          \<le> nP e1) =
    (\<forall>x\<in>set (edgesL G).
        case x of
        (e1, e2) \<Rightarrow>
          FiniteListGraph.num_reachable_norefl G e1 \<le> nP e1)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. wf_list_graph G \<Longrightarrow>
    (\<lambda>a b.
        FiniteGraph.num_reachable_norefl (list_graph_to_graph G) a
        \<le> nP a) =
    (\<lambda>a b. FiniteListGraph.num_reachable_norefl G a \<le> nP a)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. wf_list_graph G \<Longrightarrow>
    \<forall>x.
       (FiniteGraph.num_reachable_norefl (list_graph_to_graph G) x
        \<le> nP x) =
       (FiniteListGraph.num_reachable_norefl G x \<le> nP x)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x.
       wf_list_graph G \<Longrightarrow>
       (FiniteGraph.num_reachable_norefl (list_graph_to_graph G) x
        \<le> nP x) =
       (FiniteListGraph.num_reachable_norefl G x \<le> nP x)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x.
       wf_list_graph G \<Longrightarrow>
       (FiniteGraph.num_reachable_norefl (list_graph_to_graph G) x
        \<le> nP x) =
       (FiniteListGraph.num_reachable_norefl G x \<le> nP x)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x.
       FiniteGraph.num_reachable_norefl (list_graph_to_graph G) x =
       FiniteListGraph.num_reachable_norefl G x \<Longrightarrow>
       (FiniteGraph.num_reachable_norefl (list_graph_to_graph G) x
        \<le> nP x) =
       (FiniteListGraph.num_reachable_norefl G x \<le> nP x)

interpretation Dependability_norefl_impl:TopoS_List_Impl 
  where default_node_properties=SINVAR_Dependability_norefl.default_node_properties
  and sinvar_spec=SINVAR_Dependability_norefl.sinvar
  and sinvar_impl=sinvar
  and receiver_violation=SINVAR_Dependability_norefl.receiver_violation
  and offending_flows_impl=Dependability_norefl_offending_list
  and node_props_impl=NetModel_node_props
  and eval_impl=Dependability_norefl_eval

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. TopoS_List_Impl SINVAR_Dependability_norefl.default_node_properties
     SINVAR_Dependability_norefl.sinvar sinvar
     SINVAR_Dependability_norefl.receiver_violation
     Dependability_norefl_offending_list NetModel_node_props
     Dependability_norefl_eval

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (SecurityInvariant SINVAR_Dependability_norefl.sinvar
      SINVAR_Dependability_norefl.default_node_properties
      SINVAR_Dependability_norefl.receiver_violation \<and>
     (\<forall>G nP.
         wf_list_graph G \<longrightarrow>
         SINVAR_Dependability_norefl.sinvar (list_graph_to_graph G) nP =
         sinvar G nP)) \<and>
    (\<forall>G nP.
        wf_list_graph G \<longrightarrow>
        set_offending_flows (list_graph_to_graph G) nP =
        set ` set (Dependability_norefl_offending_list G nP)) \<and>
    (\<forall>P.
        Dependability.node_props_formaldef P = NetModel_node_props P) \<and>
    (\<forall>G P.
        (distinct (nodesL G) \<and>
         distinct (edgesL G) \<and>
         Dependability.eval (list_graph_to_graph G) P) =
        Dependability_norefl_eval G P)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. SecurityInvariant SINVAR_Dependability_norefl.sinvar
     SINVAR_Dependability_norefl.default_node_properties

    (\<forall>G nP.
        wf_list_graph G \<longrightarrow>
        SINVAR_Dependability_norefl.sinvar (list_graph_to_graph G) nP =
        sinvar G nP)
 2. (\<forall>G nP.
        wf_list_graph G \<longrightarrow>
        set_offending_flows (list_graph_to_graph G) nP =
        set ` set (Dependability_norefl_offending_list G nP)) \<and>
    (\<forall>P.
        Dependability.node_props_formaldef P = NetModel_node_props P) \<and>
    (\<forall>G P.
        (distinct (nodesL G) \<and>
         distinct (edgesL G) \<and>
         Dependability.eval (list_graph_to_graph G) P) =
        Dependability_norefl_eval G P)

       \<Longrightarrow> SINVAR_Dependability_norefl.sinvar

       Dependability.node_props_formaldef P =

           case node_properties P i of
           None \<Rightarrow>
             SINVAR_Dependability_norefl.default_node_properties
           | Some property \<Rightarrow> property)

        distinct (edgesL G) \<and>
        Dependability.eval (list_graph_to_graph G) P) =

definition SINVAR_LIB_Dependability_norefl :: "('v::vertex, SINVAR_Dependability_norefl.dependability_level) TopoS_packed" where
    "SINVAR_LIB_Dependability_norefl \<equiv> 
    \<lparr> nm_name = ''Dependability_norefl'', 
      nm_receiver_violation = SINVAR_Dependability_norefl.receiver_violation,
      nm_default = SINVAR_Dependability_norefl.default_node_properties, 
      nm_sinvar = sinvar,
      nm_offending_flows = Dependability_norefl_offending_list, 
      nm_node_props = NetModel_node_props,
      nm_eval = Dependability_norefl_eval
      \<rparr>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. TopoS_modelLibrary SINVAR_LIB_Dependability_norefl
     SINVAR_Dependability_norefl.sinvar

proof (prove)
